about_the_game:
Season 9 Pro Pass & Hall of Fame Pass will expire at 7:59AM PT, December 31st, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 9 Pro Pass or Hall of Fame Pass is non-refundable.

The NBA 2K24 Hall of Fame Pass: Season 9 takes your MyCAREER and MyTEAM experience to the next level. The Season 9 Hall of Fame Pass includes everything in the Pro Pass: Season 9 (access to 40 levels of earnable premium rewards, & 4 additional Season Pass Rewards), a 15% XP Booster for the entire season, 10 Level Skips immediately applied to the Season reward track, & 15,000 VC!

*NBA 2K24 Hall of Fame Pass requires base game, internet connection and NBA 2K Account.
